_sText: Hold-up men took by storm a mini-market located in the middle of an urban city. After having liquidated the manager who refused to reveal the access to the secret vault, tension increased to such a degree that the police intervened and sealed off the surroundings. In view of the obstinacy of the latter, the hold-up men undertook to kill one hostage every 30 minutes. The various attempts to negotiate having done nothing but lead to a blood bath, the task force decides to risk a battleâ€¦
